title: What causes fat people to be attracted to other fat people?
body:
This isn't a fat-bashing post. Just legitimate inquiry.

I often see heavy people dating other heavy people and I wonder why that is. Are they actually sexually attracted to them or is it because they don't think they could get a skinnier gf/bf? Is physical appearance not as important to them because they aren't as attractive themselves? I get that personality is more important than appearance but you have to be, at least on some level, attracted to someone to date them.

What's the deal, gd?
